title: Processes - Average Value of a Function

content.question: The average value of a function <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> over the interval <math alttext="open bracket, negative 1 comma 2, close bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> is <math alttext="negative 4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, and the average value of <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> over the interval <math alttext="open bracket, 2 comma 7, close bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>7</mn><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> is 8. What is the average value of <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> over the interval <math alttext="open bracket, negative 1 comma 7, close bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mn>7</mn><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

topic.text: 8.1: Finding the Average Value of a Function on an Interval

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
